title: Pairing for Stag?
content:
I'm trying to decide what to pair Stag (used for headlines) with, it's used in a design I've inherited and have to turn a digital publication around quite quickly. Currently it uses a combination of Meta Serif for body and both Gotham and Whitney for box outs and folios.

Do people think the Stag/Meta combination work? and do you think Whitney or Gotham should be the preferred sans??

Think it's a case of 'can't see the wood for the trees' - can't see objectively on this...

Thanks
author: dendicott
